certificates.originalText:
CERTIFICATE OF COMPLETION

This is to certify that
John Doe
has successfully completed the course
Computer Science and Engineering
at MIT University
Date: 15/06/2023
Grade: A+
CGPA: 9.5/10

GRADUATION CERTIFICATE

This certifies that
Jane Smith
has graduated with honors in
Electrical Engineering
from Stanford University
Date: 20/05/2023
Grade: First Class with Distinction

DIPLOMA CERTIFICATE

This is to certify that
Bob Johnson
has successfully completed
Mechanical Engineering
at IIT Delhi
Date: 10/07/2023
Grade: 8.7 CGPA

MASTER'S DEGREE CERTIFICATE

This certifies that
Alice Brown
has been awarded the degree of
Master of Business Administration
by Harvard University
Date: 30/04/2023
Grade: Magna Cum Laude

CERTIFICATE OF ACHIEVEMENT

This is to certify that
Charlie Wilson
has successfully completed
Data Science and Analytics
at University of California Berkeley
Date: 12/08/2023
Grade: 9.2/10

BACHELOR'S DEGREE CERTIFICATE

This certifies that
Diana Prince
has been awarded the degree of
Bachelor of Arts in Psychology
by Oxford University
Date: 25/06/2023
Grade: First Class Honours

PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATE

This is to certify that
Ethan Hunt
has successfully completed
Cybersecurity Specialization
at Carnegie Mellon University
Date: 18/09/2023
Grade: Distinction

DOCTORATE CERTIFICATE

This certifies that
Fiona Gallagher
has been awarded the degree of
Doctor of Philosophy in Chemistry
by Cambridge University
Date: 03/11/2023
Grade: Pass with Distinction

CERTIFICATE OF COMPLETION

This is to certify that
George Miller
has successfully completed
Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
at MIT University
Date: 14/12/2023
Grade: A Grade with 9.8 CGPA

POSTGRADUATE CERTIFICATE

This certifies that
Helen Troy
has been awarded
Postgraduate Diploma in Digital Marketing
by London School of Economics
Date: 28/10/2023
Grade: Merit

RANCHI, JHARKHAND

has successfully completed the Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech)
degree program in Computer Science and Engineering
with a CGPA of 8.5 out of 10.0.

Date of Completion: May 15, 2023
Registration Number: JUT/CSE/2019/1234
Certificate Number: JUT/CERT/2023/0567
